about:
Hello! My name is Jerral Graham and I'm a Software Engineer with a passion for developing robust, responsive and scalable web applications. With a strong foundation in front-end development and a keen eye for creating intuitive user interfaces and experiences, I strive to deliver exceptional results with every project I undertake. 
 As a Software Engineer, I specialize in developing web applications using React, JavaScript, Node, Express, and Python. I take pride in my ability to build efficient and reliable APIs, utilizing my back-end development skills with Node and Express. Additionally, I have experience working with Python, which I have been using to develop back-end services and data analysis. 
 
 I'm always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skillset to stay on top of the latest trends in the industry. As a quick learner, I'm able to adapt to new environments and technologies with ease, and I'm always ready to take on new challenges and projects. 
 
 Aside from my work as a Software Engineer, I also have a passion for exploring new hobbies and interests. In my free time, I enjoy hiking and exploring the great outdoors, as well as cooking and trying out new recipes. As a life-long learner, I also enjoy reading about new technologies and staying up-to-date on industry trends. 
 
 My goal as a Software Engineer is to continue to grow my skillset and take on new challenges that allow me to develop innovative solutions to complex problems. Ultimately, I aim to become a leading expert in my field, delivering exceptional results to my clients and contributing to the growth and development of the industry.
